attributes.action: Ban disruptive demonstrations in major cities from lasting more than one day
attributes.additional_details: The Government should legislate to ban demonstrations for the same or similar cause from lasting more than a single day and from being repeated before a 3 month period has expired. This should include those by the same or similar group of protesters
attributes.background: Disruptive demonstrations in our major cities lasting more than one day are on the rise and causing millions of people and companies unacceptable levels of inconvenience and lost earnings.
